author: Fox News
title: No-fly zone in Ukraine worth the risks; Putin may attack Western nations anyway, GOP rep says
description: Rep. Brian Mast said he favors a no-fly zone over Ukraine, even if it risks escalating the conflict and pulling in the U.S.
content:
U.S. Rep. Brian Mast, R-Fla., says he supports imposing a no-fly zone over Ukraine, despite the risks involved with the U.S. shooting down Russian aircraft and escalating the conflict.
